title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6060.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6060.2 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) The term Division shall mean the Division of Criminal Justice

Services. (b) The term gunsmith
shall mean any person licensed or required to be licensed as a gunsmith as such
term is defined in subdivision (8) of section
265.00
of the

Penal Law. (c) The term dealer in
firearms shall mean a dealer in firearms pursuant to section
400.00
of the

Penal Law, as such term is defined in subdivision (9) of section
265.00
of the

Penal Law. (d) The term serialized
shall have the same meaning as such term is defined in subdivision (8-a) of
section
265.00
of the

Penal Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6060.2

Adopted

New

York State Register October 23, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 43, eff. 10/23/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
